H0.text: What medical word refers to an inflamed throat, from the Greek word for throat. Pharyngitis

H1.text: What medical word refers to an inflamed throat, from the Greek word for throat. Laryngitis

H2.text: What medical word refers to an inflamed throat, from the Greek word for throat. Tonsillitis

H3.text: What medical word refers to an inflamed throat, from the Greek word for throat. Rough voice

A4.text: The word comes from the Greek word pharynx meaning 'throat' and the suffix -itis meaning 'inflammation'.

A5.text: Pharyngitis is inflammation of the back of the throat, known as the pharynx.
